snippet: Time Lapse Dance celebrated the 150th birthday of Loïe Fuller with a performance that recalled her pioneering work.
abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews tribute concert to modern dance pioneer Loie Fuller, performed by Time Lapse Dance and choreographed by Jody Sperling, at Joyce SoHo.
lead_paragraph: Time Lapse Dance celebrated the 150th birthday of Loïe Fuller with a performance that recalled her pioneering work.

headline.seo: Time Lapse Dance at the Joyce SoHo
headline.main: Traveling on Foot to the 19th Century
headline.print_headline: Traveling on Foot to the 19th Century
